Translations.Text: yaayyuha l-nabiyu qul li-azwajika wabanatika wanisai l-mu'minina yud'nina ʿalayhinna min jalabibihinna dhalika adna an yuʿ'rafna fala yu'dhayna wakana l-lahu ghafuran rahiman
la-in lam yantahi l-munafiquna wa-alladhina fi qulubihim maradun wal-mur'jifuna fi l-madinati lanugh'riyannaka bihim thumma la yujawirunaka fiha illa qalilan
malʿunina aynama thuqifu ukhidhu waquttilu taqtilan
sunnata l-lahi fi alladhina khalaw min qablu walan tajida lisunnati l-lahi tabdilan
yasaluka l-nasu ʿani l-saʿati qul innama ʿil'muha ʿinda l-lahi wama yud'rika laʿalla l-saʿata takunu qariban
inna l-laha laʿana l-kafirina wa-aʿadda lahum saʿiran
khalidina fiha abadan la yajiduna waliyyan wala nasiran
yawma tuqallabu wujuhuhum fi l-nari yaquluna yalaytana ataʿna l-laha wa-ataʿna l-rasula
waqalu rabbana inna ataʿna sadatana wakubaraana fa-adalluna l-sabila
rabbana atihim diʿ'fayni mina l-ʿadhabi wal-ʿanhum laʿnan kabiran
